common.smartAccountDescription: Your Smart Account is a self-custodial wallet powered by Privy â€” fully yours, just easier to use.
common.directConnectDescription: Connect directly to your wallet without any intermediaries.
common.viewWarningPara2: SOL to interact with the app, click to open the wallet UI

trade.limitOrderWarning: Limit orders will only execute if sufficient liquidity is available at the time of order execution.
trade.shortWarningLine1: Max payout on short is equivalent to the borrowed USDC (size).
trade.shortWarningLine2: More about the peer2pool perp model
trade.onlyUsdcAllowed: Only USDC is allowed as collateral for short positions.
trade.provideCodeToSupport: Please provide this code to the support team
trade.title: Title
trade.collateralValueMustBeAtLeast10: Collateral value must be at least $10
trade.cannotVerifyLiquidity: Cannot verify liquidity - missing price data for {{symbol}}. Please try again later.
trade.sltpNotAvailableInLimitOrderMode: SL/TP is not available in Limit Order mode.
trade.fullyBackedAssetsTooltip: For fully backed assets, long positions must use the same token as collateral. For shorts or longs on non-backed assets, collateral should be USDC. If a different token is provided, it will be automatically swapped via Jupiter before opening or increasing the position.
trade.swapSlippageHint: This sets how much the price can move during the swap.
trade.maxSizeTooltip: The maximum size of the position you can open, for that market and side.
trade.availableLiquidityTooltip: This value represents the total size available for borrowing in this market and side by all traders. It depends on the pool's available liquidity and configuration restrictions.
trade.positionInfoTooltip: The values shown are estimates based on current prices. Actual results may vary at execution, especially if a token swap is involved. This means your initial leverage and liquidation price might differ slightly.

feesSection.feeInfoPara1: 0 BPS entry fees - 14 BPS exit fees
feesSection.swapFeeTooltip: The collateral you provided does not match the assets you're opening a position for, as such the platform will first have to do a Swap. Swap fees are dynamic and based on the Liquidity Pool's ratios, and currently that direction isn't favorable in term of fees. You can decide to go through or change the provided collateral.

chartControls.hourlyBorrowRateDescription: Hourly borrow rate in % of position size
chartControls.annualBorrowRateDescription: Annual borrow rate in % of position size

editPosition.leverageBelowMinimum: This action would take the leverage below the minimum of 1.1x. Please adjust your input.
editPosition.cannotFindJupiterRouteForSwap: Cannot find Jupiter route for {{from}} â†’ {{to}}.
editPosition.useDirectlyAsCollateral: You can use {{token}} directly as collateral instead.
editPosition.positionAboveMaxLeverage: Your position is above the maximum leverage of {{leverage}}x, you cannot withdraw more collateral.

pickTokenModal.usingRightAssetAvoidSwap: Using the right asset avoid unnecessary swap.

closePosition.cannotFindJupiterRouteForSwap: Cannot find Jupiter route for {{from}} â†’ {{to}}.
closePosition.remainingCollateralMustBeAtLeast10: Remaining collateral must be at least $10
closePosition.sizeToCloseMustBeGreaterThan0: Size to close must be greater than $0
closePosition.closePositionTooltip: When closing a long position, you receive the same collateral you used to open it. When closing a short position, the collateral is returned in USDC. If you want a different asset, a Jupiter swap is required.
closePosition.exitFeesTooltip: Open fees are 0 bps, while close fees are 16 bps. This average to 8bps entry and close fees, but allow for opening exactly the requested position size.
closePosition.borrowFeesTooltip: Total of fees accruing continuously while the leveraged position is open, to pay interest rate on the borrowed assets from the Liquidity Pool.

sharePositionModal.shareOnX: Share on X (just paste your PnL image)
sharePositionModal.readyToShareOnSocialMedia: Ready to share on social media!
sharePositionModal.iJustMadeOnPosition: I just made {{value}} on {{side}} position on ${{token}}!

tradeHistory.failedToExportPositions: Failed to export positions. Please try again.
tradeHistory.noPositionsAvailableForDateRange: No positions available for date range {{from}} to {{to}}

stake.adxRewardsAccrue: ADX rewards automatically accrue at the end of every staking round.
stake.liquidStakedADXUnstake: Liquid staked ADX can be unstaked at any time. Locked ADX can be retrieved once the locking period is over.
stake.genesisRewardsTooltip: These rewards accrue over time for the first 180 days of the protocol. The amount is proportional to your participation in the Genesis Liquidity campaign. Thank you for being an early supporter of the protocol! ðŸŽŠ ðŸŽ
stake.roundDurationTooltip: Each round duration is ~6h (+/- some jitter due to Sablier on chain decentralized execution). At the end of a round, the accrued rewards become claimable, and a new round starts. The ADX and ALP rounds are not necessarily in sync.
stake.youCanUnstakeAtAnyTime: You can unstake at any time.
stake.ownShareProtocol: Own a share of the protocol: Adx governance token provides yield and voting power when staked. Align with the protocol's long term success and earn more. 20% of the protocol fees and revenues are distributed to stakers.
stake.usdcYieldDescription: Base yield for all staker in the form of USDC. They originate from platform fees and revenues (20%)
stake.adxYieldDescription: For the most committed users who Lock Stake their ALP, an extra yield distributed as ADX token. The yield amount is a function of the lock duration.
stake.governanceBoostDescription: Lock Stake your ADX and receive amplified voting rights to influence the protocol. The additional voting rights is a function of the lock duration, and only available during the lock duration.
stake.alignWithProtocolSuccess: Align with the protocol's long term success: the longer the period, the higher the rewards. 20% of protocol fees are distributed to ADX stakers.
stake.noDataAvailable: No data available for this page.
stake.aprInfo:
The displayed APR are projected values based on the last 7 days rolling. The liquid USDC rewards is given to each ALP, staked or not. Therefore the APR displayed below is the sum of liquid and locked APR.
To give the most accurate estimate, the APR calculation uses the price of ADX at the time the staking round is resolved.
The APR does not include Genesis ADX rewards.
stake.aprInfoAdx:
The displayed APR are projected values based on the last 7 days rolling.
To give the most accurate estimate, the APR calculation uses the price of ADX at the time the staking round is resolved.
stake.showMoreInformationAboutMyStakes: Show more information about my stakes
stake.hideAdditionalInformationAboutMyStakes: Hide additional information about my stakes
stake.upgradeExistingStakeDescription: Upgrade an existing stake, in duration and/or quantity.
stake.upgradedStakeWillAccrueRewards: The upgraded stake will accrue rewards right away.
stake.ifUpgradedStakeWillUnlockIn: If upgraded, the stake will unlock in {{days}} days.
stake.upgradeStakeExample: Example: if you've been staked for 30 out of a 90 days lock, upgrading to 180 days lock will bring you back to 0/180 for the whole amount

ranked.bestPnlPercentDesc: Trader with the highest single profitable trade by percentage.
ranked.topLiquidationDesc: Trader with the largest single liquidation in USD value.
ranked.topBorrowFeesDesc: Trader who paid the most borrow fees in USD.
ranked.topExitFeesDesc: Trader who paid the most exit fees in USD.
ranked.mostTradesDesc: Trader who closed the most positions.
ranked.consecutiveWinsDesc: Trader with the longest winning streak.
ranked.consecutiveLossesDesc: Trader with the longest losing streak.
ranked.consecutiveLiquidationsDesc: Trader with the longest streak of liquidated trades.
ranked.firstBloodDesc: First trader to open and close a position with a PnL/Volume ratio of 10% in the competition.
ranked.lastStrawDesc: Last trader to close a position with a PnL/Volume ratio of 10% before the competition ends.
ranked.bestShitpostTweetDesc: Funniest or most viral shitpost about Adrena. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.bestAnniversaryTweetDesc: Best tweet celebrating Adrena's anniversary. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.bestFeatureIdeaDesc: Most valuable idea for improving Adrena, submitted on Discord. Winner selected by the team.
ranked.bestArtworkDesc: Coolest community artwork related to Adrena. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.anniversaryCelebration: To celebrate our first year, we are hosting a special raffle party! Accumulate raffle tickets by trading and get a chance to win big prizes!
ranked.waitingForSeason: Waiting for the season to start
ranked.createProfileToJoin: Create a profile to join the competition!
ranked.tradingPreSeasonDescription: Welcome to Adrena's trading pre-season, anon! This six-week event is the introduction to our upcoming recurring trading seasons. From November 11th 12pm UTC to December 23rd 12pm UTC, traders will vie for PnL-based ranks in one of four volume-based divisions. Your total trading volume during the six-week event determines your division qualification. Check out the divisions below, continuously updated based on onchain events.
ranked.tradingPreSeasonRules: Only positions open after the start date and closed before the end date qualify. Each weekly periods ends on Monday 12am UTC, except the last one ending at 12pm UTC. Volume is determined by Open/Increase and Close positions. It's accounted for when the position closes (close or liquidation).
ranked.biggestLiquidationDescription: The trader with the single highest liquidation amount for the week.
ranked.feesRaffleDescription: Each $50 fees paid give you an entry. Winner picked at the end of the week.
ranked.topDegenDescription: Highest PnL on a 100x initial-leverage position, w/o further increase. Add/remove collateral accepted.
ranked.solVolumeRaffleDescription: Each $100k volume of SOL traded give you an entry. Winner picked at the end of the week.
ranked.grindWeeklyDescription:
Battle weekly with mutagen to rank in the top 100 and earn season points.
Only trades opened and closed within the weekly period count.
ranked.notRankedWeekly: You are not ranked. Earn Mutagen by trading, completing quests, and maintaining streaks and climb the ladder.
ranked.rankedWeekly: You are ranked #{{rank}} in this weekly leaderboard. Earn Mutagen by trading, completing quests, and maintaining streaks and climb the ladder.
ranked.becomeChampionDescription:
At the end of the season, the top 100 traders will be crowned champions.
The ranking is based on the Season Points earned.
ranked.notRankedSeason: You are not ranked. Earn season points in weekly leaderboards to climb the ladder.
ranked.rankedSeason: You are ranked #{{rank}} in the season. Earn season points in weekly leaderboards to climb the ladder.
ranked.carefulChoiceDefinitive: Careful this choice is definitive for the entire season!
ranked.rewardsTooltip: Rewards are distributed in ADX, JTO, and BONK tokens. USD values are indicative. Prizes are officially attributed at the end of each week and are for information purposes only before then.
ranked.docsRewardsDescription1Part2: â€”earn weekly payouts plus massive end-of-season bonuses!
ranked.docsRewardsDescription2: Unlike Season 1's fixed prize pool, Season 2 features a dynamic prize pool that unlocks progressively across 10 action-packed weeks.
ranked.docsRewardsDescription3: Attack the boss with mutagens to unlock rewards. Each health bar you destroy releases weekly ADX/JTO/BONK rewards and seasonal ADX bonuses. Defeat the boss every week to claim the full prize pool!
ranked.docsOfficersDescription1Part1: Each faction has 3 commanding officers: a
ranked.docsOfficersDescription2: Officers must complete 3 weekly mutagen generation targets to maximize their team's pillage potential and activate powerful mutagen self-referrals.
ranked.docsOfficersDescription3: First week officers are selected from the top 6 traders during interseason.
ranked.docsOfficersDescription4: Leadership can change weekly through a ruthless promotion system:
ranked.docsOfficersPromotion1: â†’ Lieutenants who generate 2Ã— their General's mutagen seize command.
ranked.docsOfficersPromotion2: â†’ Sergeants who produce 3Ã— their Lieutenant's mutagen earn promotion.
ranked.docsOfficersPromotion3: â†’ Any faction member generating 4Ã— their Sergeant's mutagen claims the officer role.
ranked.docsWeeklyTradingPeriod: Saturday 12:00:00 AM UTC to Friday 11:59:59 PM UTC
ranked.docsWeeklyTradingDescription1Part3: ) will count toward that week's mutagen generation and leaderboard rankings.
ranked.docsWeeklyTradingDescription2: Trades carried over from previous weeks or left open at week's end will not contribute to your weekly score. Plan your trading strategy accordingly to maximize your impact!
ranked.docsPillageDescription1Part1: After each battle week, damage differential determines pillage potential. The dominant team can raid up to
ranked.docsPillageDescription1Part2: of enemy rewardsâ€”if their officers fulfilled their weekly mutagen generation targets.
ranked.docsExample1Description1: Team JITO : 200 mutagen damage | Team BONK : 150 mutagen damage
ranked.docsExample1Description2: â†’ JITO's 33% damage advantage + completed officer goals giving a max cap of 30%.
ranked.docsExample1Description3: â†’ Result: JITO seizes the maximum 30% of BONK's weekly rewards, adding them to their own treasure hoard.
ranked.docsExample2Description1: Team BONK : 200 mutagen damage | Team JITO : 150 mutagen damage.
ranked.docsExample2Description2: â†’ BONK's 33% damage advantage, but officers only completed half their missions, giving a max cap of 15%.
ranked.docsExample2Description3: â†’ Result: BONK pillages just 15% of JITO's rewardsâ€”officer performance halved their raiding potential.
ranked.docsExample3Description1: Team JITO : 230 mutagen damage | Team BONK : 200 mutagen damage
ranked.docsExample3Description2: â†’ JITO's modest 15% damage advantage + fully completed officer goals, giving a max cap of 30%.
ranked.docsExample3Description3: â†’ Result: JITO claims 15% of BONK's rewardsâ€”pillage percentage matches their damage differential.
ranked.whoQualifyTooltip: Top 25 traders by volume will qualify for rewards distribution
ranked.qualifyTooltip: To qualify your wallet must have been one of the recipient of the JTO airdrop, and you must have made at least one $10k size trade. The first 600 participants will qualify, if less they will split the rewards.
ranked.eligibleForAirdrop: You are eligible for the JTO airdrop!
ranked.notEligibleForAirdrop: You are not eligible for the JTO airdrop. Trade more to qualify!
ranked.damageTheBossAndUnlockRewards: DAMAGE THE BOSS AND UNLOCK ADX, BONK AND JTO REWARDS
ranked.teamToPillage: {{team}} TEAM TO PILLAGE {{percentage}}% OF {{enemyTeam}} TEAM REWARDS
ranked.pillageTooltip: Due to {{team}} team dealing {{damage}} more damage and their officer unlocking up to {{maxPillage}}% maximum pillage threshold, they can pillage {{percentage}}% of the {{enemyTeam}} team's rewards.
ranked.teamWithMostDamage: TEAM WITH MOST DAMAGE GET MOST OF THE REWARDS,
ranked.balancedTooltipPart1: Each team gets 50% of the rewards. On top of that, there's a mechanism where the team dealing more damage can pillage up to 30% of the opposing team's rewards.
ranked.balancedTooltipPart2: The exact percentage depends on two factors:
ranked.balancedTooltipFactor1: 1. Whether the officers hit their weekly goals
ranked.balancedTooltipFactor2: 2. Whether the team outdamaged the other by 30% or more
ranked.celebrationMessage: To celebrate our first year, we are hosting a special raffle party!
ranked.ticketAccumulationMessage: Accumulate raffle tickets by trading and get a chance to win big prizes!
ranked.summerEventRule: For this Summer Event, the rule is simple: Top 25 traders will share the prize pool of 21,200 JTO and 3,160,000,000 BONK.

buy_alp.liquidityPoolDescription: The liquidity pool serves as the counterparty for traders, supplying the assets needed when users open leveraged positions. Essentially, traders borrow tokens to execute their trades, and pay fees for the service.
buy_alp.alpTokenDescription: The ALP token represents shares of said pool, and its value is backed by:
buy_alp.diversifiedIndexFund: A diversified index fund comprising JitoSOL, BONK, WBTC and USDC.
buy_alp.netPnL: The net profit and loss of traders within the ecosystem.
buy_alp.feesGenerated: 70% of all fees generated by the pool, including:
buy_alp.structureBenefits: This structure ensures ALP token holders benefit from both the pool's underlying assets and its trading activity.
buy_alp.feesAccrue: All fees continuously accrue in the pool when each trade closes.
buy_alp.jitoSolYield: LPers also benefit from JitoSOL native yield.
buy_alp.liquidityAmountFeeNotFound: Liquidity amount and fee not found
buy_alp.poolRatioReached: Pool ratio reached for this token
buy_alp.swaplessRouteTooltip: Use the swapless route to mint ALP directly with this token. No fees when minting with USDC. Fees apply when minting with non-stable assets.
buy_alp.availableLiquidityTooltip: Available {token} depends on pool ratios and what s currently borrowed by traders.
buy_alp.fullyUtilizedWait: If {token} is fully utilized, wait for traders to close positions.
buy_alp.redeemMoreThanAvailable: If you try to redeem more than available, consider DCA or another pair â€” the pool will rebalance automatically.
buy_alp.needHelpDiscord: Need help? Reach out on Discord.
buy_alp.boostALP: Boost your ALP with leverage loop

monitoring.moreRevWeightToClimb: more rev. weight to climb the ladder!

monitoring.clickTraderViewProfile: Click on a trader to view user profile
monitoring.totalLiquidityJupiter: Total liquidity available through Jupiter aggregator
monitoring.adxStakingRewardsNextRoundDesc: Accruing, will be available at the end of the current round.
monitoring.adxStakingRewardsPendingClaimsDesc: Rewards from past rounds (resolved), waiting to be claimed.
monitoring.tokensLockedInStakingProgram: Tokens locked in the staking program.
monitoring.pythProgramDesc: Account containing the source code of the Pyth smart contract.
monitoring.adxMintDesc: Adrena's Governance token mint, can be staked for governance and revenue share access.
monitoring.alpMintDesc: Adrena's Liquidity Pool token mint, represents a share of the pool.
monitoring.governanceAccountsDesc: List on-chain accounts related to Governance.
monitoring.governanceProgramDesc: Manages the DAO's operations as the official Solana governance smart contract.
monitoring.governanceRealmDesc: Represents Adrena's DAO within the Solana DAO program.
monitoring.registeredDomainSns: Registered Domain through Solana Name Service (SNS)
monitoring.totalClaimedUsdcTooltip: Total amount of USDC that has been claimed by the wallet.
monitoring.totalClaimedAdxTooltip: Total amount of ADX that has been claimed by the wallet.

profile.nicknameMustBeBetween3To24: Nickname must be between 3 to 24 characters long
profile.traderProfileDescription: Your trader profile is required to trade. It tracks your PnL, fees, and trading stats, giving you a detailed view of your performance. It also serves as your Adrena identity in the ecosystem.
profile.carefulNicknameCost: Careful! Once your nickname is set, changing it will cost ADX. Choose wisely!
profile.nicknameMustBeAtLeast3: Nickname must be at least 3 characters
profile.youMustBeConnectedToEdit: You must be connected to edit your nickname
profile.youMustBeConnectedToUpdate: You must be connected to update your profile
profile.lockedUnlockByAchievement: Locked - Unlock by completing the achievement "{achievement}"
profile.registeredDomainSNS: Registered Domain through Solana Name Service (SNS)
profile.title: Title

referral.receive10PercentFee: And receive 10% of the trading fee
referral.grant10PercentFee: And grant 10% of your trading fees
referral.createProfileToActivate: Create your profile to activate referral system
referral.noRefereeYet: No referee yet. Share your referral link!
referral.notSupportingAnyone: You are currently not supporting anyone
referral.supportTeamDescription: You can support the Adrena team through the referral system by choosing the team as your referrer. This is purely philanthropic. It's a way to show your support and contribute to the team's funding.

mutagenLeaderboard.allTimeLeaderboardDescription: The ALL-TIME leaderboard tracks total Mutagen earned since launch.
mutagenLeaderboard.tradeToClimb: Trade to climb the ranks and boost your airdrop shareâ€”every closed position counts!
mutagenLeaderboard.clickToScrollToRow: Click to scroll to your row
mutagenLeaderboard.generateMutagenToClimb: Generate {number} Mutagen to climb the ladder!

footer.searchByUsernameOrWallet: Search by username or wallet address...
footer.enterUsernameOrWallet: Enter a username or wallet address to find user profiles
footer.tryDifferentSearch: Try searching with a different username or wallet address
footer.showingFirst50Results: Showing first 50 results. Refine your search for better results.
footer.averageYieldForAlp: Average yield for ALP in the last 7 days
footer.averageYieldForStakedAdx: Average yield for 540d staked ADX in the last 7 days
footer.newTradersLast24Hours: New traders in the last 24 hours
footer.newTradersLast7Days: New traders in the last 7 days
footer.automaticallySelectsBestRpc: Automatically selects the best RPC endpoint based on latency
footer.useSqrtScaleForVolumeAndFeeChart: Use Sqrt scale for volume & fee chart
footer.sqrtScaleTooltip: SQRT scale reduces the gap between small and large values by using their square root. This makes charts easier to read when there are big spikes, since extreme values don't overshadow the rest of the data.
footer.speedUpTransactions: Speed up your transactions with Dynamic Priority Fees following the market rate.
footer.priorityFeeOptionsExplanation: The Medium/High/Ultra options are based on the 35th/50th/90th percentile of the current market rate. Accurate values are fetched right before each transaction.
footer.maxPriorityFeeExplanation: Maximum amount of SOL to be spent on priority fees per transaction, this ensure you never go over your limit.

alp.liquidityPoolDescription: The liquidity pool serves as the counterparty for traders, supplying the assets needed when users open leveraged positions. Essentially, traders borrow tokens to execute their trades, and pay fees for the service.
alp.alpTokenBackedBy: represents shares of said pool, and its value is backed by:
alp.alpStructureEnsures: This structure ensures ALP token holders benefit from both the pool's underlying assets and its trading activity.
alp.feesAccrue: All fees continuously accrue in the pool when each trade closes.
alp.jitosolYield: LPers also benefit from JitoSOL native yield.
alp.boostAlpLeverageLoop: Boost your ALP with leverage loop
alp.availableTokenDependsOnPool: Available {{symbol}} depends on pool ratios and what's currently borrowed by traders.
alp.ifTokenFullyUtilized: If {{symbol}} is fully utilized, wait for traders to close positions.
